Thanks St.Ack . Your feedback is helping us a lot. By chores I meant
to  ha=
ve cutsom Order.xml to load the crawl job, and not maintain a
web console, =
I did not mean it in terms of Crawler functionality but
in terms of deploym=
ent.

I went through the UBI article, I guess we had figured this scheme,
b=
ut this is  a peer I/O per URL, wouldn't you agree ? Also, depart
from this=
 the churn in the number of agents is expected to be pretty
low, in which c=
ase I am wondering if it is a better option to share
the Already Seen list =
upon joining of an agent, as then the URL would
almost never be re-fetched.=
  I agree that a central Seen List is a bad
option.
